title: Night Before the Exam - A Level Sociology Paper 1 Revision
description: Freedom is in sight! The exam's nearly over, but join Jono for one final push as he HyperCrams some key topics for the A Level Sociology Paper 1 exam. Processes in schools? Covered. Educational policies? Check. Research surveys and experimental methods? Deciphered. Hotel? Trivago.  For more info visit www.senecalearning.com.
dc:creator: Seneca Learning Revision
